pages.title: Bowling Glove
pages.text: $(byellow)Bowling Glove$() is a tool use to place bowling. Face and right click $(l)Wall Nut, Explode-o-nut, Giant Wall Nut$() with this item to pick bowling up, then right click the ground to launch bowling.$()

pages.title: Bowling Glove Recipe
pages.text: The recipe of Bowling Glove need $(l)nut, leather, amethyst ingot, Defence Essences, Explosion Essences$().
